long_description: Don't let the small size fool you. The Mammut T-Peak headlamp has a bright beam that will light up the night on glacier climbs and backpacking trips. Headlamp features 1 high-output LED and 2 standard LEDs that combine to give you 5 brightness levels and 1 emergency strobe to meet your needs on nighttime adventures. For simple lighting tasks use the standard LEDs on low or high; for long-range lighting, use the high-output LED on high or dual mode (high-output LED with standard LEDs). Special boost mode gives you a short blast of light that outputs 90 lumens and throws a beam up to 70m. Strobe mode allows the light to blink 6 times per minute so that it can be left on as a beacon in an emergency. 3 AAA batteries (included) provide up to 100 hrs. of use on low and 20 hrs. on high; battery-life indicator lets you know when the batteries are running low. Double-click switch-lock prevents accidentally running down the batteries while the headlamp is stowed in your backpack. Weighing only 2.5 oz., the Mammut T-Peak headlamp is barely noticeable in your pack.
short_description: Don't let the small size fool you. The Mammut T-Peak headlamp has a bright beam that will light up the night on glacier climbs and backpacking trips.
